website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a good deal on a multipurpose steamer that can clean grout and do much more, this 2-in-1 package is hard to beat.
pros: Kit generates enthusiasm for including two tools - a mop and hand-held steamer that can also be used on fabrics
Lives up to the brand name, as both tools are lightweight and easy to use
cons: Handheld tool occasionally produces intermittent steam for no apparent reason
Pads that come with the mop are flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Steamy Sides
customer_reviews.text: I liked the versatility of the handheld steamer, it worked great on my upholstery. However, after the first application, the steam no longer came out of the mop, but out of the side of the unit. I could literally see a gap on both sides of the unit where the body had separated from the handheld steamer. The mop head and my floor were completely dry. Because of this malfunction, I had to send it back and order from a different company.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned a steamer before and based upon all of the great reviews bought this one specifically for cleaning an area rug. It doesn't easily glide over the rug and it didnt clean anything. So I tried it in the shower of our newly built home..another bust as it didnt clean anything. Maybe it'll make a nice lawn ornament
customer_reviews.author: Meema24

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. The pads are held on by only five very small Velcro tabs. Pads do NOT adhere and roll up under mop head rendering this mop useless. Does not emit steady stream of steam. Completely shocked this earned any five star ratings. Am returning.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Cleans nicely
customer_reviews.text: I had originally written a bad review for this product. I would now like to address the problem of it falling over all the time and not standing up. I don’t know if it’s all of the steemers or only the one I purchased. I have found that I need to push a little harder, when not in use, so that the steamer will stand up. I still wish the triangle accessorie would lock in place.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in August 2018 and it is 4 months later and it quit working. I would give it a 0 if I could. When one pays this much for a product, the features that one likes tend to go out the window when the product quits working! I did not use this product more than 10 times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this steam mop to come in, but was ultimately disappointed after the first usage. It was light and easy to use and initially cleaned our hard wood floors wonderfully. After the first day, it pretty much stopped working. Steam stopped coming out of it the second time we tried to use it. I tried reading the manual to figure out what was wrong, but nothing worked.
customer_reviews.author: steven martinez

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Frustrated with how little this machine cleans. It is supposedly a deep cleaning mop. But, it barely removed the lightest spots on my floors. The attachment is fair for steaming. But, again it doesn’t do much for cleaning. So disappointed I missed my return window. Big let down. It certainly was easy to fill the machine with water and assemble, but what’s the point if your surfaces aren’t getting clean...
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: I didn't find anything it did well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steam mop for vinyl floor cleaning and for getting rid of crud on grout and tub caulking. It didn't work well on vinyl and not nearly enough pressure or hot enough steam to do the job on grout and caulking. My Swiffer works better on vinyl and a $4 jug of good mildew remover works better on grout and caulking. I would have returned it, but didn't try it out in time to do that. Most of the products I've ordered on Amazon have been fine. This steam mop was an exception.
customer_reviews.author: Doug P.

customer_reviews.title: Best product since sliced bread!!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased all around with the Light 'n' Easy Steam mop.. after trying multiple floor mops with no success in being satisfied, this I can say I am, the bonus is you can steam clothes AND also use for deep cleaning the bathroom. I saved money actually because my husband wanted me to buy a clothes steamer and here I got 3 in 1!! Bought our house and previous homeowner didn't clean very well, there was goop on the tile floor on between toilet and wall, this mop got it right up, see video I posted, I thought i was going to have to buy some seriously strong chemical cleaner, nope, under 1 minute it was up!!
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee4333

customer_reviews.title: This company is a scam
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. It is inconsistent with it's steam and then stops all together. I have had contact with the seller direct, they asked for videos etc which I provided. They then said I had a faulty unit and they would send a replacement. Sounds good, but no replacement item received and all my emails now go unanswered. So, now we have a useless expensive piece of junk that's headed for the garbage. BUY AT YOUR OWN RISK.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Really pumps out the steam!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this for our slate floors in the Kitchen and works great. Then changed the mop cloth (which was very yucky and picked up "stuff" that we never knew about) and started on our NuCore vinyl laminate floors. Again, worked great. In the Kitchen we had a few small white paint spots from a previous painting project. Just hovered over the spots and the paint came right up. The small water cup that comes with it holds just enough water to fill the mop. We are using it on High and lasts about 10-15 minutes. We are using only Distilled water. Cheap at Walmart, $0.94/gallon. No reason not to use it...
customer_reviews.author: ElectroSam

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product so far! I cleaned my entire apartment, all laminate and tile floors. Everything looks brand new. I was skeptical, and I still don't think I can do everything without chemicals, but with the steam mop, I can cut down on the use of those products big time. That will save money for sure, and is just a small way in which I can live a more environmentally responsible life. I've had no problems so far, though I wish it had come with 3 cleaning pads instead of one. I don't have a washing machine in my apartment, so it would have been great to have extras.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Choose something else
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the cord is too short! You will need at least a dozen of the mopping pads. The pads need replaced after every room (and we clean our house regularly). I really needed two pads just for the kitchen. It took two tanks of water for the kitchen and you have to go so slow my arm got tired. It really needs an indicator light to let you know to refill it. Now for the most ridiculous feature. The cord is permanently attached to the tank. Yes, you have to drag the cord with you to empty the tank! I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Stare

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Wow, coming from Pursteam, this is a much better product. Its a heavier, so that it can put more pressure to create more contact on the floor. It actually uses less water and hence more efficient. The temperature without the mop pad is 140 degrees, and with the pad is around 120 degrees, enough to kill most germs. Glides very smooth and super quiet. For the $20 difference, you are get superior product. Used it for about a week, hope this last longer than the 2yrs on the Pursteam.
customer_reviews.author: tiredad

customer_reviews.title: Worked well until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: We've had our Light and Easy for a year and used it on our stone and wood floors. Used it once every other week and it worked well to clean and sanitize the floors, until it stopped steaming and started to leak water onto the floor. T he tank unit heats up but no steam comes out. We are very disappointed that it lasted only 1 year after approximately 26 uses. I would expect something to last longer for the amount of the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best steam machine/mop I have owned
customer_reviews.text: I have owned 4 different steam mops or steam tools before this one over the years. This one is the best yet. The only negative for me is the cord length. I have a large great room area connected to my kitchen. I have to change outlets to get from one end to the other. Other than that, it is GREAT. It really gets the sticky spots from felt pads that came off chairs onto the wood floors. Nothing has worked well on that other than getting down on the floor and scrubbing by hand. It gets other spills quite well too. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mom to three

customer_reviews.title: I love doing my floors now!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a steam mop years ago and it broke. I replaced it with one of those wet jet type mops. I never felt comfortable that the floors were clean. Plus the repurchasing of the cleaning solutions were expensive. After looking through many reviews I landed on this steam mop and absolutely love it. Easy to use, thoroughly cleans the floor with high heat steam with simple tap water, comes with great attachments for extra cleaning. Doing the floors are no longer a chore. If you are looking for a great mop-this is it!
customer_reviews.author: MamaBird

customer_reviews.title: No replacement cloths.
customer_reviews.text: The cloth attachments on this device wrap around the unit. But the official replacement cloths sold don’t have the wrap around function. They’re just flat cloths. So you can’t buy replacement cloths for this. Once you lose the original cloths, it’s useless and you have to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Workable but not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I've been through a lot of steamers, I get a new one about every two years. I haven't found one that I would buy again. Pros: I love the detachable steamer, the floors dry almost instantly, works great on hardwood and tile, cleans wooden chairs, great for furniture Cons: Short cord, the pad does not stay on (it balls up) -it barely covers the surface of the head, the extra head attachment does not lock-it's floppy-so it makes the job a little more difficult
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Handy for wood or tile
customer_reviews.text: We just moved into to a new house and bought this in anticipation of caring for wood floors. So far, it has been a breeze! The steam mop easily cleaned the tile floor at our short term apartment when we moved out. Since moving into our home, we've used it several times to clean the wood floors. After days of demolition/plaster board settling everywhere, we could see quick and easy results with the mop. Haven't used it to steam clean appliances or anything outside of the floors, but I'm sure we'll put it to good use. Happy with the purchase to-date.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy M

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning the floor
customer_reviews.text: Our tile flooring was really dirty. We just had the drive and parking lot of the condo resurfaced at the same time I came home from the hospital for surgery. I wasn’t able to do much of anything for a year. My daughter decided to go ahead and map the floor downstairs after all the medical people who came through bringing in the loose pavement particles into the condo. The scrubber did a fantastic job taking layers of pavement off. The machine was lightweight and simple to use. We used distilled water in the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H. Bunting

customer_reviews.title: Large mop head and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop. I’ve been using a wood floor product and I couldn’t believe the first this mop picked up. I know my floor is clean now. The mop head is much larger than my last steamer and love I don’t have to “pump” it to get steam. Easy on and off pads. I haven’t used the attachments yet but I’m ready to try it on a few tough issues in my house. Lightweight. The only complaint I have is the cord is not long enough for me. I have a open concept floor plans the cord is far too short for me plug in even two separate plugs and finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubby is a happy man and floors are clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, there are several different ways you can use this steamer. Normal floor cleaning, a handheld mop head for small spaces and a micro steam for even smaller spaces. We haven't had to use the smaller heads just yet, but the main unit is easy to setup and start using. Floors seemed very clean afterwards and the cloth was BLACK! yuck! Only complaint is they give you one of each map pad and I would like to have a few more as they pick up a lot of dirt and grime. I have a feeling this unit is going to be used a lot as my hubby loves to vacuum and clean...eat your heart out ladies!
customer_reviews.author: J. Christie

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Makes job take much longer than with a rag.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Only steams intermittently for a few seconds. It has a safety feature that requires your bare hand to be on the handle while steaming, so can’t clean things like dog snot off the doggy door while wearing gloves. If you take your hand off the sensor it takes 30 seconds to build up pressure again. Returning and buying a Shark.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Baird

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money or hype! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The only good thing I can say about this machine is for hardwood floors. It does a good job there. I've tried it on countertops, showerheads, berber carpeting with floor glider ( it will not even stay on while trying to move it! Much less clean it at all). I am very disappointed. I bought it as I've had two back fusions and can't bend to scub like I used to. Was hoping this was a good answer. Haven't gotten around to sending it back. I'm as well off as using my old Shifter cleaner and a whole lot less expensive. Differently, not worth the hype or money.
customer_reviews.author: Sandyswim

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well but the cleaning pads seem flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I have used the steamer to clean my hardwood floors, tile floors and counter tops, and I am impressed with how well the it cleans the floor, but it left streaks on my hardwood floors. I have re-cleaned the same areas of the floor, and the streaking is not as bad, but is still not entirely gone. The pads seem flimsy to me and tend to get crinkled and dislodged if there is any resistance. I was also surprised to see that the mop comes with only one cleaning pad and, fortunately, I ordered a couple more, but even with those I can only clean about one room at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Mstea

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my steam mop
customer_reviews.text: It is, in fact, light and easy to use. Gets plenty hot on the High setting. Steam isn't magic, so keep your expectations reasonable. Does get hot enough to warp wood, so if using on wood floors, keep it on Low. Half my house is ceramic tile and this thing is indispensable. Was a little worried about quality at this price point, but those concerns turned out to be unfounded. Plenty durable. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: MADMongoose

customer_reviews.title: NO customer service = NO Warranty.
customer_reviews.text: NO CUSTOMER SERVICE which means NO WARRANTY. I will remove this review once someone reaches out to me but I have had a broken steam mop for a year and a half, that broke within its warranty period (only a few months). I have emailed every email I could find. I have spent hours writing emails and following up with absolutely no response. One person asked me for my order and photos and then never wrote back. I have had a broken product cluttering my closet for quite awhile and I hope this company makes good on their warranty and actually communicates.
customer_reviews.author: Blaire Fellows

customer_reviews.title: Not what i thought it would be for a pricey item.
customer_reviews.text: The Tank does not snap in or out and once released it feels like it would pop back out anytime now. Poor design and tooling. My feeling is after some use with boiling hot water to create steam and then cooling off, the plastic will lose its tensile-ness and it will not plug back in properly thereby causing it to become loose and easily popping out even unintended. Also, everything seems a bit clunky and over-sized, like in most aspects it should be sized down a bit, it feels over-sized unnecessarily so give you a feeling of clunkiness when it shouldn't be.
customer_reviews.author: nantamco

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and produces right amount of steam
customer_reviews.text: Just received and set up was easy. Mopped my floor, steam cleaned my oven hood and tiles. Produces just the right amount of steam. I definitely would recommend. I do wish they gave you at least two pads so you could change it if your floor is really dirty as it doesn’t glide as well once the pad is dirty. The cord could also be longer and wish you could store it filled with water. It does heat up quickly and is easy to fill. So far it’s a great cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: scubagirl

customer_reviews.title: Overall great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: LPROS:This product works WONDERFULLY. It cleans my white tile and tub well, cleans the sink, unsealed stone backsplash, and stainless steal appliances without corroding anything. I love that it stops spitting steam if you aren’t moving the tank - this will save wood floors if you leave it one spot too long! Cons: It’s a touch heavy on lower steam levels, but glides easy on high which is not why I rated it a 4 on ease to use. My one complaint is that the mop pad gets dirty very quickly. I’m wondering if I can use my swifter pad on it or not.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa R.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a steam mop, which WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have tested this mop after robovac mopper after being sick with irobot roomba sweeper in my new house. there a lot f mops are in the market but very few good ones with steam. This one worked perfectly for my hardwood floor. I have 2 and 7 year old sons and both of them keep spilling things all the time. It is hard to keep cleaning again and again. I just do this mop in night after roomba sweeps the floor and in morning floor feels so nice. I love it. I have tried bissil spin wave as well but had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep Singh

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and seems well made...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this model. Used the handheld to clean out funky deposits in corners - just wiped them away. Then I cleaned the vinyl floor and it really cleaned it. Puts out a lot of steam and heats up fast. On / off trigger is clumsy and it's odd they hid the water level when the handheld is in the mop saddle. Attachments are secure and slip on and off easy. Highly recommendable!
customer_reviews.author: GRF

customer_reviews.title: Product that does not perform as stated.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to finally use my stem cleaner. I steamed my shower doors and tile and to my surprise it did not clean!!!!!!! Left spots on my glass and the shampoo residue on my marble shower chair remained. I had to get my sponge and my cleaning products to clean my shower. Will never recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Blumenthal

customer_reviews.title: does it work?
customer_reviews.text: It works under the right situations. It is light and maneuverable, easy to use. I use it on tile floors and it does what it says it will do. If your floors are dirty, clean them before you the steam mop. Otherwise you will be changing the mop pad very often. But it does leave the tile streak free and clean. It comes with only one mop pad which is perfect if you have a tiny little floor to clean. My suggestion is to buy 6 addition pads other wise you will be changing and cleaning the one pad to continue your cleaning... I wonder why the manufacturer would not provide a few additional pads since I paid $100?
customer_reviews.author: AJE

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't love it more
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this steamer and use it nearly every day. The ease of having the handheld steamer makes cleaning so much quicker and easier. I had an old stove someone gave me covered in years of caked on grease, I tried everything, even oven cleaner to cut through it but nothing worked until I used this and now my stove looks brand new. My husband was sensitive to smells of strong detergents and caused breathing difficulties but using this streamer made all that a thing of the past. I highly recommend it. Its easy, lightweight, fast and does an amazing job and its pretty to look at too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this steam mop! (not such a great instruction manual though)
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous product, and it works just as I thought it would. I bought it for my floors, but I'm now discovering all sorts of other things it's great for, such as the grimy range hood that I thought would NEVER be clean again. It sparkles! The only thing that wasn't great was the little pamphlet that was supposed to be the instruction manual. Did they forget to put in a real one? Is that really it? It was pretty useless. Not a problem though, because I was able to learn everything from the other reviewers on Amazon and Youtube. Get this mop--you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt get hot
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a year and it's just not that great. The steam isnt as great as others said. It's not overly hot and doesnt get dirt up that great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniiii

customer_reviews.title: Just what hard floors need!
customer_reviews.text: A nice blend between mop and sweep-but much better! Fast delivery and set up was super easy! I am very impressed with how clean the floors came out after just the first use! Makes me feel I have been only "dusting" the floors all this time with my old mop and broom-now they finally look and feel clean! Wish I had purchased this when I first purchased the house and the floors were brand new instead of 5 years old now-I absolutely think this Light n Easy steam mop would have kept them looking brand new as day one, but this is a good 2nd best! Very happy I made the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: C Wills

customer_reviews.title: Has made my floors much easier to keep deep cleaned.
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed the easy set-up. It did come in a box that clearly said what the product inside was but I made sure to stay home. Likes: it really cleaned deeper than what my handheld pushing mops could ever get. I love how well the steam works but I wish there was a shut off button. Dislikes: a bit weird to use at first due to no off button. You realize it goes as you move it or out your finger in the sensor I stead of a trigger. I enjoyed it once I got used to it. Would I recommend it? YES!!!!! If you like a clean home this will save you a lot of back breaking work.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Steam cleaner
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this steam cleaner is the hand held cleaner works great. What I find dysfunctional is the mop. The cloth is so flimsy it falls off. I can’t steam all of my floors without the mop falling off. I bought another cleaner for my floors and will use the hand held steam cleaner for cleaning parrot cages, bathrooms, and kitchen counters.
customer_reviews.author: JMMAdams

customer_reviews.title: Big Nope
customer_reviews.text: Tried to clean the tub - did not do anything. Tried to steam iron a shirt - it was faster to get the ironing board and iron. Ironed 4 shirts the old fashioned way quicker than it took to get 1 shirt barely less wrinkled than when I started it. Cord is a mess. I can't understand why Amazon recommended this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kayden5404

customer_reviews.title: How to request a replacement?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in March of this year and, although I liked the way it cleaned, the steamer stopped working after a few weeks of general use. The description states a one year free replacement policy, but I'm not able to start a return on Amazon. Can someone please help with this? Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hardwood floor cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We use this to clean the hardwood floor in our kitchen and dining area. It removes the fine layer of oil that tends to gather in the kitchen/dining area. Like most good quality products, this comes with a very long (15-20 feet) long power chord so we can clean an entire room without hopping from one power outlet to another. It's too soon to speak for the durability as we just started using it, but the quality of the material and workmanship give reasons to be optimistic about durability.
customer_reviews.author: Sindhu

customer_reviews.title: Cleans best, reusable, multiple settings and attachments.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this on my list for awhile because of its multifunction capabilities. Finally moved into my new place which is primarily hardwood floor and it’s fantastic. At first I couldn’t tell if it was cleaning because with the steam it doesn’t leave a wet residue. But from the stains in the floor that it lifted with ease I find it fantastic! The additional tools for cleaning out counter crevices is magical and it’s handheld ability makes this my favorite steam mop that I’ve ever owned. Recommend for ocd peeps like me and it’s reusable pads can keep you above normal clean levels and not investing weekly in throw away pads and cleaners. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Detachable water tank, multiuse feature is the only reason I buy this model
customer_reviews.text: I like the detachable handheld unit feature, although I have used it as much as I expected. Also purchased this model for the three levels of steaming option since my last steamer would steam too much, but that has disappointing since the highest level is all I use. The other two are too low to be useful. It’s quieter than the last one I had, if that matters. My least favorite feature is how boxy the floor attachment is, harder to do corners. But overal pretty happy with it. Disclaimer: I’m writing this review to get the extra floor pad
customer_reviews.author: Wilma

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet owners
customer_reviews.text: I had been considering getting a steam mop for my floors because it is safer for my pets. I chose this one because it has some options for use on walls and even wrinkle removal for clothes. It requires more effort to push than I expected, but is gradually removing the layers of buildup from previous mopping with a solution. I really like how quickly the floors dry and that I don't have to worry about poisoning the cats. I wish the cord was a little longer but I can work with that.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Full House Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I received my Multifuctional Steamer S3601 just the other day. Since then I've cleaned my kitchen twice, bathroom floor and shower doors, lanai doors in and out, front door hall and living room. This product is a gem. It is easy to use, easy to push and easy to fill. After cleaning, I simply threw the pads in the washer and let them air dry. The directions are simple and easy to follow. I hadn't realized how dirty my house was until I started using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine K

customer_reviews.title: Did my research (extensively) and love it
customer_reviews.text: I did so much research when looking for a steam mop. I looked all through amazon, read review after review, and landed on this one. It is SUCH a wonderful asset for cleaning any type of hard floor. The pads are great and have done well in the wash and the steam is always consistent. It's easy to maneuver and the accessories and multi-function tools are such a good bonus. Will continue to use this bi-weekly. I got rid of all of my Swiffer floor products, too! Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor R

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with my new steam mop. I couldn't wait for it to arrive. Finally got there at 8pm, but I didn't care. I tried it out right away. I think this will be a great addition to my clean up routine. I'm always happy to find great new products. No more buying expensive cleaners and I love the versatility. I definitely am going to need more of the rags that go with it though as I will probably be using this quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Cutter

customer_reviews.title: Sweep Thoroughly First!
customer_reviews.text: Before you use this be sure to sweep the area thoroughly, if you don’t you'll end up pushing around a wet ball of pet hair and dirt. I’ve had no difficulty using this, other than my first time switching it to handheld. The clothes steaming option doesn’t seem to work very well for me but the floor one is great. Although the box does come with a flyer stating if you leave a review you can get another free pad I went ahead and ordered a few more. We have white tile and a muddy driveway so I tend to use this more than I do laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: The steamer was very easy to setup and use. It is very versatile. It cleaned the steps easily with the attachment. The unit came with only one cloth and the cloth does not last long before it smears dirt. It should come with more than one cloth. I recommend the purchase of extra cloths.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Steam Mop
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a previous product, but the steam was inconsistent and the dial was wonky. Hence, it was returned and I bought this one. I love the way this product operated. The whole of the pad touched the floor, unlike my previous purchase. The controls were easy to operate and the steam was consistent with the settings. I have not used the extra cleaning tools for other purposes as of yet. I do not write a lot of reviews, but I'm writing this one with the promise of 2 extra cleaning pads from the manufacturer. The extra pads will come in handy when cleaning more than 1 room.
customer_reviews.author: TMT

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret buying this!
customer_reviews.text: What a life saver! This cleans really well and I wish I had bought it sooner, seriously! I was amazed. It is a breeze for my mother and I with bad backs. No more straining to mop the old way. We had success with this on walls, floors, bathrooms, and nooks & crannies. I’m planning on buying one for myself. Life long customer here, so far!
customer_reviews.author: Auntie

customer_reviews.title: Super clean floors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have two Shih tzus who have accidents on my tile floors. I wanted to be able to clean up after them and feel that I was really getting the floor clean. Even though you can’t put cleaner into the steamer itself you can spray the cleaner on the floor and then run the steamer over it. I like that the mop shuts itself off when it’s a straight up and down position and that there’s a foot release. My bathroom tile floor never looked cleaner and when I walked on the floor it felt really clean. I also used it on my laminate floor in the kitchen and it worked great there too.
customer_reviews.author: JZNipomo

customer_reviews.title: Easier than most steamers
customer_reviews.text: I have had several steam cleaners. They all work pretty well. This one is less bulky than most. The manual is very BAD. Not enough info. Bottom of page 4 says "It is a brand new design for our produce, just the function of the on/off switch." There is no on off switch that I could find. How do I know when the tank is empty. The lights kept flashing until i leaned the handle, not mentioned in the manual. No explanation of how the handheld comes off. You need a more in depth manual with complete sentences.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa B.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year! (Used only 2-4 times monthly)
customer_reviews.text: I very much enjoyed this product for deep cleaning my tile floors and showers. However, after 11 months of using it no more than 2-4 times monthly the product began turning on and off intermittently. It appears there may be a problem with the connection between the handheld device and the push mop? Based on the price, I expected it to last much longer and I'm very dissatisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to put ot a lot of steam, easy to use. If you use it on a floor that has texture, I'm not convinced that it works that well. My biggest complaint is when I use it on my darker floor it leaves a lot of streaks. I find that disappointing. I have tried the low steam, the medium and the highest steam and it doesn't seem to matter. This is the first steamer I've tried and I expected better results.
customer_reviews.author: Not too old to learnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: First use/First impression
customer_reviews.text: Mop had adequate steam. Mop head design let me get to floor edge under cabinets. I bought extra pads to begin with, so I could change between kitchen and bathroom. It is easy to use, about the perfect weight to put a little pressure behind the steam power for a thorough cleaning. Just reading the directions, the attachments seem easy to use. I think I'm going to like this steamer for a good long while.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bowler

customer_reviews.title: Gets rid of odors!
customer_reviews.text: It was confusing at first to assemble/use. Literally dummy proof. But once you get the hang of it you cannot let it go! I used it on my tile floors as I have a puppy and it removes the pee odor and leaves it clean! I also cleaned my couches with it. It does not deep clean them BUT it definitely feels cleaner as it removes odors. Can't wait to explore more with it :)
customer_reviews.author: HUITRON

customer_reviews.title: Works better in "upright" mode than in "handheld" mode, but solid overall
customer_reviews.text: When trying to use it in "handheld mode" (steaming unit removed from the handle/floor assembly), the supply of steam was uneven which we didn't notice when the unit was docked in the handle. It made it a bit more difficult to effectively clean using that method, but not prohibitively so. Beyond that this steamer is a solid performer at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rice

customer_reviews.title: Velcro to hold cleaning pad came off
customer_reviews.text: I am so annoyed, bought this a little over two months ago and haven’t used it a lot but already the Velcro’s holding the pads to clean the floors have come off!!! The return period has expired!!
customer_reviews.author: B. V. Pelet

customer_reviews.title: The lemon of steam mops
customer_reviews.text: The detachment works great! Simple and easy to use. The first time I used it as a mop it stopped working after the second stroke! I tried as a handheld again and it wont even work as a handheld now! It just spits out cold water, you can feel it trying to do something but noting but cold water comes out! Only 2 uses before it broke down, huge waste!
customer_reviews.author: Shavya McIntyer

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first steam mop I have ever purchased. We just bought a 2400 sq ft house and half of it is vinyl planking. It was such a chore to mop. I just received this steam mop and I was mopping within minutes of opening the box. It was super easy to use and I love that I'm cleaning my floors without using chemicals! I have a 7 month old baby so it's important for my floors to be clean without chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: Handle must be tilted back towards user in order for steam to build up.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Had a little trouble at first use thinking unit would not heat up. NOTE: Mop will only "steam up" when handle is tilted back towards user, as if being mopping. Steam will not build up when unit is standing upright.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight unit
customer_reviews.text: Positives are mulifunction as a floor steamer and hand held unit for glass, wall, and clothes steamer. also, fill out the survey and get a couple of free replacement pads. Negatives are floor pads is thin and cheap looking; poor instructions, as you have to tilt the handle to activate the steam output.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Good for household general cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: I use the product on ceramic tile floors and wood floors. Both cleaned beautifully. I used the fabric attachment on my wood mini blinds. It was acceptable. Not designed for blinds, but can be used. I'll have to use it 2 or 3 times on each blind get gem fully cleaned. Because of the swivel head it's a bit cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: DelBoy

customer_reviews.title: Very good steam mop for the money, but...
customer_reviews.text: The Light and Easy steam mop does a very nice job on day to day mopping needs. we use it on travertine and ceramic tile, and it cleans well and is virtually streak free. We have used the mop as a handheld for counters, and it performed well in that function. The only downside we have experienced is using the steamer and nozzle to clean grout. It seems to lose the steaming function after maybe 30 seconds and you have to wait for it to "recharge" before continuing. This lengthens the time it takes to do the job. Other than that, I think it is a very serviceable steam mop.
customer_reviews.author: azbuck

customer_reviews.title: Used on Porcelain floors-works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have rectified porcelain tile and couldn’t get rid of the filmy look on the tile. Used this mop and my floor shines. I also bought 2 extra pads so a clean one is available. Had a soda spill during a party. This mop cleaned it up in minutes and there was no stickiness left behind. A regular mop would have taken longer and I would have had to soap clean the area to remove any stickiness. This mop is also very convenient. Just add water and turn it on. No more filling a mop bucket and pushing it around.
customer_reviews.author: RSVPag

customer_reviews.title: Great steam mop that super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mop because my dark hardwood floors, while in good condition and shiny, seemed to have a layer of grease/dirt that didn't go away despite using a popular spray "floor cleaner" every week. I wanted something that would do a deep clean (with no harsh chemicals) but be easy to use. This mop was ready to go in just a few minutes after opening and I noticed a big difference after the first use. I definitely recommend buying a few extra pads (mop only comes with one) so you can switch them out if you want to clean several rooms at once. I am excited about using the attachments for garment steam cleaning and cleaning tile grout.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Spungin

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s been great so far. It’s really helped clean up our polished concrete floors and our tile areas like in the kitchen or bathrooms. Bought the carpet glider to help use on a rug; it seems like it’s working. We will get a carpet cleaner for this in the future though for a more thorough cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: S & T

customer_reviews.title: Versatility amd function
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little getting used to but it does a good job on counters, cabinets (on low steam), grout, tubs, screens, etc. Where I think it is slow going is with floors. If your floor is dirty, you can’t go fsst. You will use lots of pafs. That’s reality. It is sliwer but cleaner. The first time you clean your floor, you dee the ground in dirt coming off. Tile especially cleans up nicely. There is nothing like steam cleaning. You get versatility with this
customer_reviews.author: B. Kodgis

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Multitasker
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be happier with the purchase! So versatile and compact. I was looking for something that will offer more than just a floor cleaner and “Light n easy” is a perfect solution. I looked for a higher end brands, but trust me this one is the winner in my opinion. There are 3 settings and the high option is my favorite, very powerful! I used it to clean my floors, kitchen, bathroom, couch and oh it irons your clothes too! No chemicals whatsoever, Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karolina

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box I was not impressed. The floor pad you get is no more than a thin Terry wash rag with a simulated quilted backing...it bunches when you mop. The water tank is small and you constantly have to fill to complete mopping. Plus it keeps shutting off. It's definitely is not a mop/lift-off for detail cleaning as I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Canby

customer_reviews.title: Being able to clean all kinds of surfaces. And it is light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I am hooked! I have cleaned every window, windows sill. The tracks on my sliding glass door. The front of my stove, the hood range, the inside glass. It doesn't an exceptional job on the floors! Yes the tank is small, but of it was any larger building out and cleaning other surfaces would kill your arm. I am happy that it is small. The only thing I'm having a problem with, is trying to order more of the hand held pads. Where do you get them?
customer_reviews.author: Kahlua

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful for lazy cleaners!
customer_reviews.text: While you may not be a lazy cleaner, I certainly can be. I hate having to put so much force into cleaning a surface I have to see a chiropractor the next day. The Light 'N' Easy steam mop proved to be a useful tool. Not only does it let me get my floors sparkly clean, it enabled me to deep clean all the gross crevices in my house, and my friend's house too. Some tunes, some steam, and a bit of time later, every surface shined. Super helpful, super easy. I definitely prefer the original floor pads over the third party ones I also received, they are much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing!
customer_reviews.text: I love my steamer! I’ve started to pay more attention to the products I use around the house and being able to use steam and no chemicals is perfect. I do usually have to refill the water tank once when doing the house. It heats up quick and I bought extra cleaning pads. I don’t know where this has been my whole life!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: My daughter in law, loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift, but now I want one too. My daughter in laws house has always been clean, but she tells me that this tool has taken that to another level. With a toddler running around not only is this fast to use, no chemicals needed. She is thrilled! With the a attachments she can go from kitchen to bath, plus clean the floors through out the house. She hasn't tried furniture cleaning yet... She's a happy gal! Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Lady A

customer_reviews.title: Simple easy effective
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this once. The wood floors in thy light were clean.. obviously were not. This very lightweight, easy to use machine truly cleaned them- as evidenced by the very dirty pad. I gave only four stars because there’s only one pad and I did not love how the steam machine worked with my microfiber couch. The attached tool wasn’t as functional as I’d hoped it would be. Otherwise, it cleaned the hardwood quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I just tested this steamer mop out today and it cleaned my tile floors really well. It is a little heavier than I expected when pushing the mop around but understandable considering its a steamer and not a vacuum. I bought this to clean the grout between my tile since its a little dirty. Its took out some of the dirt but I think my second time around I am going to use this steamer along with a scrubbing tool to get the deep dirt out. Its very easy to use and the instructions were easy to understand. I would recommend this product over any swiffer type mop. Its easy to use and it disinfects.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Used maybe 6 times and died.....
customer_reviews.text: It did work great. After maybe 6 uses in the less than 3 months I have had it, the motor turns on, but no water or steam comes out anymore. Booooo!
customer_reviews.author: Marta Carey

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I think this really helps clean my floors (my husband was skeptical!). I have a number of dogs, so it makes me feel good that my floors are being sanitized. Only downside is that you can't use any chemicals, so I still feel I need to go over it again with a cleaner to get rid of any pet smells. I haven't used the other handheld features, but I'm sure they work just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Tara S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get a deep clean!
customer_reviews.text: In its inaugural swipe in the bathroom and kitchen, both of which have month-old installed tiny tiles (ie: lots of grout), the steam mop left them fresh, white, and totally grossed me out with the amount the mop head picked up that the regular floor mop did not. I am obsessed with this thing, particularly because of the super useful attachment for cleaning the bathtub tiles. Life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Emf324

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE HANDS AND KNEES
customer_reviews.text: I am adding another review, as after just 14 months my steamer has gone bye bye. I had high hopes that this product would last awhile but was very disappointed to go use it and find that after you push the pad to get the type of steam you want, no steam comes out and the pad begins lighting up again wanting you to choose how much steam you want. Wouldn't buy another one of these again!
customer_reviews.author: ceedreamer

customer_reviews.title: Where has this mop been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I had to try out my new toy as soon as I received. I have 3 dogs in my house and I swept prior to using. To my surprise I discovered more hair that I could not see during use of this little jewel. I had just mopped a couple of days earlier using a cleaner. This mop made me realize I didn't know what clean was. I have also ordered the carpet glider so I'll let you know how it works under the review for that item. But this mop definitely is a must have especially for pet families.
customer_reviews.author: Vols Fan

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I didn’t buy sooner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer after I read most of the reviews and also reviews on deferent brands, I must say, I am pleasantly surprised. This steamer is very light weight as per the name and does a remarkable job, I recommend 100 percent, no regrets, wish I can give more than five stars,. Ps not sure what the folks who wrote negative reviews on performance are looking for, for me it’s as advertised, why give one star for something the manufacturer did not claim the product does? Do your homework and stop looking for a miracle scum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaning tool!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this steam mop! My laminate floor was looking like it had a film on it from moping with other cleaning products. I have 2 dogs and 2 kids so there is a lot of foot traffic in our home. The steam mop was so quick and easy to use leaving the floor looking and feeling brand new! I also used the hand attachment on my granite counter tops and I was impressed on how easily it cut through any grease and left the counters streak free and shiny.
customer_reviews.author: E. Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Needs frequent water refills
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble. And very easy to use. It’s my first steam mop and seems to clean OK. The little plastic filling cup only holds 2/3 cup of water, and the instructions say only pour that amount into the steamer tank. So it seems to run out of steam fast. I’m not sure how that small amount of water compares with other steamers.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Q

customer_reviews.title: Great Steamer!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and use. I used on vinyl plank flooring and it worked great and I got the satisfaction of knowing my floors are clean and sanitized. I also ordered the rug/carpet attachment and used on 2 area rugs. I looked at many steamers and was drawn to the Light ‘No Easy because of the light weight and versatility in the hand held function which also made cleaning my stone/tile shower a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Reader202

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and worked great on laminate and ceramic tile
customer_reviews.text: I just used this on my kitchen laminate and basement ceramic tile flooring. It worked great! It was easy to use and performed as I expected. The only thing I do not like is that there is no indicator which tells you when the water is gone. I am not sure how long I was just cleaning away before I felt like the water might be gone. You can not really see through the window where the bottle is to tell if there is still any water. I opened the water reservoir and turned it upside down hoping I was right and water was not going to spill all over.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Stimpert

customer_reviews.title: Steamer is Great
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with this product. I read so many reviews and this one was the winner. I use it for my cleaning business so I use it on all floors. Wood and tile are great, anything a bit rougher makes you work a bit more. Since the cloth is attached at the bottom if you use it on a rough surface the cloth is likely to rip off. The stem does come out well and is very evenly dispersed. It works well to help with horribly sticky things (stickers or gum). I’m very happy with this purchase and the way it works!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this steamer because it works very well. Hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way it steams up and gets hot immediately. The heat is very strong cutting through tough dirt stains. The thing I didn’t like is that it doesn’t turn off the steam right away when releasing the handle. It cleaned the hardwood floors beautifully. It made the interior of my car look brand new again. It’s a good product. I hope it can handle a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t steam up well or clean well
customer_reviews.text: This product has hardly any steam. Did not clean well at all. I was replacing another brand that worked well but wanted to try a different one. I’m sorry I did. I’m going back to my Bessel brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin sallah

customer_reviews.title: Picks up things from a floor you previously thought was clean!
customer_reviews.text: I had an older steam mop that I couldn’t buy replacement pads on anymore as they no longer made the machine. I had been in the market for a new one and this one had fabulous reviews so I went for it! It came in today and I immediately used it on my kitchen floor I had just cleaned and it picked up SO much more grime. It’s amazing what steam can clean! I prefer using less chemicals and more natural products and this definitely fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Jenne

customer_reviews.title: great on tile floors
customer_reviews.text: I used the steamer on my tile floors and it does a great job. Like the instructions say go slow so as not to pull off the pad. I used it on high and it got all my normal stains off the floor especially in the kitchen. Ones I've used in the past including non electric with pad, always leave some residue which needed a rag to clean up. However, I had a minimal amount of residue to clean after steaming. On time delivery as well.
customer_reviews.author: David at beach

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: The cons of this product is that you have to hold it with one hand to be able to work. How can you use the steam on fabric if you need to use one hand and the other hand of the handle which doesn't lock at any point and it's very hard to move it on the fabric. The handle on the tools moves everywhere. No steady
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: I am satisfied with my steam mop
customer_reviews.text: Great steam mop. It feels durable. It’s easy to maneuver and light. I like that you can choose from low, medium or high heat. I use low heat on my laminate floors and it does not streak. I use high heat for tile and rugs. Love the swivel head. Love the glider for disinfecting my area rugs. It does not make rugs wet nor clean deep stains, but, it does loosen dirt. I vacuum before and after steaming carpets. The only thing I would like is to have a longer cord and a little bigger reservoir. I use Distilled water only as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Christine R. Madero

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but not all accessories are included
customer_reviews.text: The machine is very easy to put together and heats up quickly. The temperature settings are handy, as I clean wood, tile and marble in my home. The handheld option worked great as I was able to clean my bathtub enclosure. I was disappointed that that the grout bristle brush was not included (although mentioned in the description) and seems not to be available for purchase. The existing set-up did not clean the grout in my bathroom, nor on my kitchen counter tiles. It's still worth it for the floors, but I had hoped for more.
customer_reviews.author: D. Falco

customer_reviews.title: A easy to use and multi-functional steam mop
customer_reviews.text: This product is very easy to use and looks sleek. I brought this steam mop because of its versatility. It could be used as steam mop, handheld steam cleaner and garment steamer with just one more additional attachment. It works very well as first two. It can stand upright to save storage space. I like the stand to stop feature when mopping. The only thing I'm dissatisfied a bit is as garment steamer, I found it will easily leave some water on the clothes. Other than that, everything is great. I'm not sure if other dedicated handheld steamer has this issue, because this is the first steamer I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Best solution to the hardwood cleaning and dust allergy!
customer_reviews.text: Best mop ever! I have dust allergy and it is such a discomfort if the hardwood floors are not cleaned properly.. I tried too many different mops in the best and this is the best so far.. the floor looks so clean and shiny afterwards.. a quick tip, don’t just use steam mop to expect the perfect cleaning, I always vacuum a little to get the best look and efficient.. I do it that way so it lasts almost a week without cleaning again.. I think you get more than what you paid for..
customer_reviews.author: Melek tugce kurus
